- |snippet_verify_license|.
- |snippet_download| |url_ti-halcogen_releases|.
- |snippet_install| |ti-halcogen|.
- |update-installation-instructions| for |ti-halcogen|.
- Update the |ti-halcogen| entry in
  ``conf/env/paths_win32.txt``.
- |snippet_update_license| in
  ``docs/general/license-tables/external/license-info_ti-halcogen.csv``.
- |snippet_changelog_entry|
- |snippet_commit|
  ``Dependency update: <XXXX>/Q<Y>: Texas Instruments HALCoGen <version number>``.
